title: Lowest Greenhouse Gas Emissions
description: In 2023, Nauru had one of the lowest total greenhouse gas emissions excluding LULUCF, with only 0.0012 Mt CO2e.

title: Lowest Methane Emissions from Agriculture
description: Nauru recorded one of the lowest methane emissions from agriculture in 2023, with just 0.0003 Mt CO2e.

title: Lowest Nitrous Oxide Emissions from Industrial Processes
description: In 2023, Nauru had one of the lowest nitrous oxide emissions from industrial processes, at 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Highest Prevalence of Tobacco Use
description: In 2022, Nauru had one of the highest prevalence rates of tobacco use among adults, with 48.3% of the population using tobacco.

title: Lowest Number of Scientific Publications
description: Nauru had one of the lowest numbers of scientific and technical journal articles published in 2022, with only 0.27 articles.
